Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.utwente.iapc.IAPConnect4.core.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A connect-4 board with variable width and height.
    Author:
    Martijn Verkleij & Axel Vugts

      • move

        public Board move(int move,
                  int player)
           throws InvalidMoveException
        Do a move. Returns a new Board.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to be done, integer between 0 and board.length - 1.
        player - Player that does the move
        Returns:
        Board A new Board.
        Throws:
        InvalidMoveException

      • getField

        public int getField(int x,
                    int y)
        Returns the current state of a field. -1 if invalid index.
        Parameters:
        x - x-position
        y - y-position
        Returns:
        0 for empty field, or currentPlayer

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Is the board full?
        Returns:
        true for a full board, or false if not

      • getWinner

        public int getWinner()
        Returns the winning player number, if there is one. 0 is not a player number, so will be returned when there is no winner. -1 is draw
        Returns:
        player number, 0, or -1.
